name: Mahjong Gok? Tenjiku
description: Mahjong Gok? Tenjiku is a mahjong tournament between characters from Xi You Ji ("Journey to the West"), the classic Chinese novel. The player can choose to play as either of the four "good" characters from Xi You Ji: the Buddhist monk Xuan Zang, the famous monkey Sun Wukong, the pig Bajie, and Xuan Zang's pupil Wujing. They compete against the variety of Xi You Ji villains. The player can choose a location to set a mahjong game in, and adapt most of mahjong rules to his own liking in a special menu.
alsoFor: 3DO, Android, PC-98, PC-FX, PlayStation, SEGA Saturn | Combined View

shot.caption: All the rules can be changed.
Now they warn me not to play too much :)
Confusing, huh. Reminds me of my old family mahjong sessions.
In fact this additional screenshot brings nothing new to the table.
If this looks like Son Goku ridding his Kinto'un, it's because it KINDA is. Journey to the West is the classic tale where Dragon Ball originated from. So there you have it.
Pure silk scroll, so smooth to the touch.
